sentences: Mary Jo Slater (n√©e Lawton; born April 19, 1946) is an American casting director and producer for film, television and theatre.
Slater was born in Trenton, New Jersey, the daughter of Anna Mae (Sweeny) and Leonard Joseph Lawton.
She was a production assistant for Mark Twain Tonight!
and had her first casting role for the 1977 Broadway revival of Hair.
